definition: to go/to go to (a place)/(of a time etc) last/just passed/to send/to remove/to get rid of/to reduce/to be apart from in space or time/to die (euphemism)/to play (a part)/(when used either before or after a verb) to go in order to do sth/(after a verb of motion indicates movement away from the speaker)/(used after certain verbs to indicate detachment or separation)

sentences.english: Any indecent advertisements need to be censored.
sentences.chinese: 任何粗鄙或有伤风化的广告，应该删去。

sentences.english: Lautenbacher said the program might eliminate some sensors from the orbiters.
sentences.chinese: 说，卫星上的感应器可能会删去一部份。

sentences.english: The censors eviscerated the book to make it inoffensive to the President.
sentences.chinese: 审查员删去了该书的精华以取悦于总统。

sentences.english: Try to prune your essay of irrelevant detail .
sentences.chinese: 尽量删去你那文章中无关的细节。

sentences.english: Several words have been deleted from the article by the censor.
sentences.chinese: 那篇文章中有好几个字被新闻检查官删去了。

sentences.english: Several words have been deleted from the report.
sentences.chinese: 那篇报道中有好几处文字被删去了。

sentences.english: If you could prune away the unnecessary adjectives in this essay, it would be improved.
sentences.chinese: 如果你把论文中不必要的形容词删去，会使文章更好。

sentences.english: Several word have is delete from the article by the censor.
sentences.chinese: 那篇文章中有好几个字被新闻检查官删去了。

sentences.english: Enables you to remove a name from the list of environment variables.
sentences.chinese: 允许你从环境变量表中删去一个名字。

sentences.english: Please erase her name from the list .
sentences.chinese: 请把她的名字从名单中删去。

sentences.english: I cancelled many unnecessary words in my manuscript.
sentences.chinese: 我把我原稿许多不需要的字删去了。

sentences.english: The Chinese subtitle, however, mistranslated her remarks such that the endorsement was removed.
sentences.chinese: 中文字幕却错译，删去她认同的字句。

sentences.english: You agreed obliterates all networks article?
sentences.chinese: 你是否同意删去所有网络文章？

sentences.english: He chopped the short story by two paragraphs.
sentences.chinese: 他把这篇短篇小说删去了两段。

sentences.english: INVOICE SHOWING "E. AND O. E." SHOULD BE DELETED.
sentences.chinese: 发票显示的“错漏当查”应删去。

sentences.english: The moral offensive remarks in the book had to be expurgated before it could be printed.
sentences.chinese: 这本书在付印前必须删去道德上冲撞的话语。

definition: to abridge (a text)/to edit out (of a movie)/to cut back (a budget, a curriculum)
clauses and sub-clauses (in formal document)/entry (in a dictionary, encyclopedia etc)
to omit/to delete/to leave out/to neglect/to skip over
to cut (from a movie etc)/to censor
